game.name: The Complex
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 런던에서 대규모 생물 무기 공격이 일어난 뒤에 두 과학자는 시간과 공기가 떨어져 가는 실험실에 갇히게 됩니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: After a major bio-weapon attack on London, two scientists find themselves in a locked-down laboratory with time, and air, running out. The Complex is an interactive sci-fi thriller movie where your decisions lead to one of eight suspenseful endings.
game.developers: Wales Interactive, Good Gate Media, Little Jade Productions

reviewHighlights.text: The Complex is an FMV game about a virus outbreak in London. The main character Dr Amy Tenant is a scientist who is trapped in a laboratory with a few...
The Complex starts with an interesting premise, but sadly it never fully lands on its paws. While the idea of a live action, choice-driven thriller so...
